name: corner window rectangle
notes:
crochet for good with the corner window rectangle pattern, designed for warm up america! section drives. this easy-level project is perfect for beginners and seasoned crafters alike. the pattern includes clear written instructions and a helpful video tutorial (coming soon) to guide you through each step. whether you're looking to relax with a simple project or expand your crochet skills, this pattern is a fabulous stash buster.
  
**unique features-**
  
• easy-level pattern suitable for all skill levels
• includes written instructions and video tutorial for guidance
• uses red heart super saver yarn for durability and color options
  
  
**materials needed-**
  
• hook: 5mm (us size 8.0)
• yarn:  [**red heart super saver**](https://amzn.to/475ekv4) (aran weight, 58-60 yards)
